name: Avoid using exception handling inside loops
description: Reports all methods with loops (for, while, do while)  that contains a try/catch block.
output:
This report lists all methods that contains try/catch blocks in a loop.
It provides the following information:
 Method full name
rationale: Exception handling tends to be relatively costly, given the work in unwinding the stack, trying various exception handlers, and so on. You should avoid placing try/catch blocks within a loop as it can add up when performed many times inside a loop.
remediation: If possible, put the loop inside the try/catch block.
